snippet: Security services in Azerbaijan have arrested 22 people they say were hired by Iran to carry out terrorist attacks against groups including the United States and Israeli embassies.
abstract: Security services in Azerbaijan arrest 22 people they say were hired by Iran to carry out terrorist attacks against groups including the United States and Israeli embassies.
lead_paragraph: Security services in Azerbaijan have arrested 22 people they say were hired by Iran to carry out terrorist attacks against groups including the United States and Israeli embassies.

headline.main: Azerbaijan: 22 Held as Iranian Agents in a Terrorism Plot, Officials Say
headline.print_headline: Azerbaijan: 22 Held as Iranian Agents In a Terrorism Plot, Officials Say
